SendID.description: Contains identifier for a specific send.

EventDate.description: Date when a tracking event occurred.

BatchID.description: Ties triggered send sent events to other events (like clicks and opens that occur at a later date and time)

CorrelationID.description: Identifies correlation of objects across several requests.

BounceType.description: Defines type of bounce associated with a bounced email.

BounceCategory.description: Defines category for bounce associated with a bounced email.

SMTPCode.description: Contains SMTP code related to a bounced email.

SMTPReason.description: Contains SMTP reason associated with a bounced email.

ModifiedDate.description: Indicates the last time object information was modified.
